issue.title: [CF 54] GCD doesn't always show on icons during combat
issue.body:
Lvl 80 DK

I have Show Timers checked for most of my spells, but the GCD seems to disappear randomly during combat. Not sure when this started happening, but it was during one of the more recent versions.

On spells like Obliterate, I've also seen it show the cooldown timer when it's not really on cooldown.


> Posted by CurseForge user Kharthus | Imported from CurseForge issue #54 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: TellMeWhen.lua

TellMeWhen.lua


> Posted by CurseForge user Kharthus

Thanks for posting a ticket. I had the spell to check the GCD set as plague strike. Until i upload a new version, change line 501 of TellMeWhen.lua from

        DEATHKNIGHT=45462, -- plague strike

to

        DEATHKNIGHT=47541, -- death coil

Edited Nov 26, 2010

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

That didn't do it.

Just checked on another class and it's not working there either.


> Posted by CurseForge user Kharthus

Tried it on DK and Hunter. GCD sometimes works and sometimes doesn't.


> Posted by CurseForge user Kharthus

I have no idea then. I have been using TMW on my hunter for over 2 years and have never had a problem. Have you tried disabling all other addons? It could be an addon conflicting with the cooldown frames. Let me know if you find any that may be causing the problem. Deathknight GCD was definitely checking a spell that isn't always on the GCD. Hunter GCD checks serpent sting, and the only way that it could bug is to have a revive pet cast interupted, causing your nature school to be locked out.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Sorry about that, didn't see the new option that was added in 2.0.1 to ignore the GCD. Working fine now.


> Posted by CurseForge user Kharthus
